2023-03-01.name: Bakugan: Legends
2023-03-01.desc:
The Awesome Brawlers realize that the connection between Earth and Vestroia is on the verge of disappearing, bringing a new threat to the surface!

Source: Netflix

Note: It streamed on Netflix US on 01.03.2023 and in Japan it streamed on 31.03.2023.

2023-03-03.name: Eiga Doraemon: Nobita to Sora no Utopia

2023-03-04.name: Shingeki no Kyojin: The Final Season (2023)
2023-03-04.desc:
The fate of the world hangs in the balance as Eren unleashes the ultimate power of the Titans. With a burning determination to eliminate all who threaten Eldia, he leads an unstoppable army of Colossal Titans towards Marley. Now a motley crew of his former comrades and enemies scramble to halt his deadly mission, the only question is, can they stop him?

Source: Crunchyroll

2023-03-08.name: Yoru wa Neko to Issho (2023)
2023-03-08.desc: * Based on a comedy slice of life manga by Kyuryu Z.

2023-03-17.name: Oshi no Ko
2023-03-17.desc:
* Based on a seinen manga written by Akasaka Aka and drawn by Yokoyari Mengo.

"In the world of showbiz, lies are weapons." Amemiya Gorou works as an OB-GYN in the countryside, a life far removed from the entertainment industry. Meanwhile, his favorite idol, Hoshino Ai, has begun her climb to stardom. The two meet in the worst possible way, setting the gears of fate in motion!

Source: Manga Plus

Note: The first episode received a theatre release on March 17, 2023. The regular TV broadcast started on April 12, 2023.

2023-03-18.name: Fuyu no Okurimono
2023-03-18.desc:
The original short animation "Winter Gift" depicts the growth of a girl and her encounters with mysterious creatures.

Note: The film received an early screening at a special event on March 11, 2023 at Cinema City Cinema Two in Tokyo. The regular release was on March 18, 2023.

2023-03-20.name: Tentai Kansoku
2023-03-20.desc: One of five collaboration short films created by various artists and anime creators for "TOHO animation Music Films" project, as part of TOHO animation 10th anniversary project.

2023-03-21.name: Himitsu no Hana no Niwa
2023-03-21.desc: One of five collaboration short films created by various artists and anime creators for "TOHO animation Music Films" project, as part of TOHO animation 10th anniversary project.

2023-03-21.name: Umi no Manimani
2023-03-21.desc: Music video directed by Dokai Asuka for the song Umi no Manimani by YOASOBI.

2023-03-21.name: Yomawari Neko
2023-03-21.desc:
The story of a cat who's drawn to the scent of tears and goes to those who are crying in an attempt to comfort or encourage them.

Source: M-U

2023-03-22.name: Neko to Wakai se na
2023-03-22.desc: One of five collaboration short films created by various artists and anime creators for "TOHO animation Music Films" project, as part of TOHO animation 10th anniversary project.

2023-03-22.name: Sore Shikanai Wakenai Deshou
2023-03-22.desc:
* Based on a picture book by Yoshitake Shinsuke.

The story centers on a girl who worries too much about the future, and her grandmother who tells her that the future has many possibilities. Through her family, the girl learns a fun way to view the future.

Source: ANN

2023-03-23.name: Detarame na Sekai no Melodrama
2023-03-23.desc: One of five collaboration short films created by various artists and anime creators for "TOHO animation Music Films" project, as part of TOHO animation 10th anniversary project.

2023-03-24.name: Colors
2023-03-24.desc: One of five collaboration short films created by various artists and anime creators for "TOHO animation Music Films" project, as part of TOHO animation 10th anniversary project.

2023-03-31.name: Moshi Meta: Moshi Joshikousei ga Metaverse de Miko ni Nattara
Rakudai Majo: Fuuka to Yami no Majo
2023-03-31.desc:
* Based on a children's book series written by Narita Satoko and illustrated by Senno Enaga.

The series contains stories about adventures, first love, friendship and a family secret of Fuka, a little witch in training.
